projects.title: AI Voice Agent
projects.summary: Multi-language voice assistant with LLaMA 3 and ElevenLabs
projects.problem: Users need a voice assistant that can understand multiple languages, generate intelligent responses, and reply with natural-sounding speech in real-time conversations.
projects.solution: Built an end-to-end pipeline integrating Whisper for speech-to-text transcription, LLaMA 3 via Groq API for intelligent response generation, and ElevenLabs for realistic text-to-speech synthesis. The system processes voice input, generates contextual responses, and outputs natural speech.
projects.results: Successfully created a functional multi-language voice assistant demonstrating end-to-end AI pipeline integration. The system handles real-time voice conversations with natural language understanding and human-like speech output.
projects.learnings: Gained hands-on experience with LLM APIs, voice synthesis technologies, real-time audio processing, and integrating multiple AI services into a cohesive pipeline.

projects.title: Fantasy Team Simulation
projects.summary: Cricket fantasy team optimizer using machine learning predictions
projects.problem: Fantasy cricket players struggle to select optimal team combinations from hundreds of players, considering form, match conditions, and statistical performance patterns.
projects.solution: Developed a machine learning system that analyzes historical player statistics, recent form, venue conditions, and opposition strength to predict player performance. The model uses ensemble methods to recommend optimal team selections with expected point projections.
projects.results: Built a predictive model that improved team selection accuracy by analyzing multi-dimensional player data. The system provides data-driven recommendations for fantasy team composition with confidence scores.
projects.learnings: Developed expertise in feature engineering for sports analytics, ensemble modeling techniques, and building practical ML applications for real-world decision-making scenarios.

projects.title: HSN Code Validation System
projects.summary: Automated validation system for Harmonized System Nomenclature codes
projects.problem: Manual validation of HSN codes in trade and customs documentation is time-consuming, error-prone, and requires expert knowledge of complex classification rules.
projects.solution: Created an automated validation system that checks HSN code format, validates against official classification databases, and flags inconsistencies. The system uses rule-based validation combined with fuzzy matching to identify potential errors and suggest corrections.
projects.results: Reduced HSN code validation time by 80% and improved accuracy by catching format errors and classification mismatches. The system processes thousands of codes efficiently with detailed error reporting.
projects.learnings: Gained experience in building robust validation systems, working with complex regulatory data structures, and designing user-friendly error reporting mechanisms.

projects.title: Email Classifier
projects.summary: NLP-based email categorization and priority detection system
projects.problem: Users receive hundreds of emails daily and struggle to prioritize important messages, leading to missed critical communications and reduced productivity.
projects.solution: Built an NLP-powered classification system using TF-IDF vectorization and machine learning algorithms to automatically categorize emails into predefined categories (work, personal, promotions, spam) and assign priority levels based on content analysis and sender patterns.
projects.results: Achieved 92% classification accuracy on test dataset. The system successfully identifies urgent emails and reduces inbox management time by automatically organizing messages into actionable categories.
projects.learnings: Developed strong understanding of text preprocessing, feature extraction techniques, and practical NLP applications for productivity tools.

projects.title: Loan Approval Prediction
projects.summary: Machine learning model for predicting loan approval likelihood
projects.problem: Financial institutions need to assess loan applications quickly and consistently, but manual review processes are slow and subject to human bias.
projects.solution: Developed a supervised machine learning model that analyzes applicant data including income, credit history, employment status, and loan amount to predict approval probability. The model uses logistic regression and decision trees with feature importance analysis to provide transparent predictions.
projects.results: Created a model with 85% prediction accuracy that processes applications in seconds. The system provides explainable predictions with feature importance rankings to support decision-making.
projects.learnings: Gained experience in handling imbalanced datasets, feature engineering for financial data, and building interpretable ML models for high-stakes decisions.

projects.title: Live OCR System
projects.summary: Real-time optical character recognition from camera feed
projects.problem: Users need to quickly digitize text from physical documents, signs, or printed materials without manual typing, especially in mobile or field scenarios.
projects.solution: Built a real-time OCR system using computer vision that captures video feed from camera, detects text regions, and extracts characters with high accuracy. The system includes preprocessing for various lighting conditions and text orientations.
projects.results: Achieved real-time text extraction with 88% accuracy across various fonts and lighting conditions. The system processes 15+ frames per second and handles multiple text regions simultaneously.
projects.learnings: Developed expertise in computer vision techniques, image preprocessing pipelines, and optimizing real-time processing performance.

projects.title: Scientific Calculator
projects.summary: Web-based scientific calculator with advanced mathematical functions
projects.problem: Users need a reliable, accessible calculator for complex mathematical operations without installing desktop software.
projects.solution: Created a responsive web-based scientific calculator supporting basic arithmetic, trigonometric functions, logarithms, exponents, and memory operations. The interface provides keyboard shortcuts and expression history for improved usability.
projects.results: Built a fully functional calculator with intuitive interface that handles complex mathematical expressions. The application works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
projects.learnings: Strengthened front-end development skills, learned expression parsing and evaluation, and gained experience in creating responsive user interfaces.
